column2: Tumor protruded from head, sacrificed due to tumor ulceration, not tumor burden
DCT-TVA; Braf; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, primary tumor,spleen
Tumor located on top of head was solid, ulcerated, approximately 1cm in diameter.  Cell line was attempted; a vial was prepared for cryo; skull intact, no mets on lungs upon visual inspection.
